comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Somehow this blog has turned into a big "Dave vs. Matt" cycling match. Wasn't that settled yesterday when I smoked Dave on Neva? I keeeed, I keeeed. Wonderful day, great ride. Dave retains his crown.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Still trying to solve that pictogram... Penant + petrified snake = semi-retarded designer. I just don't get it. By the way, the Burton-Underwood conflict appears to have reached a stalemate... at least for now. The combatants have agreed to scale back the level of corrosive trash talk and to demonstrate at least a modicum of civility in their day-to-day dealings both on and off the bikes. And - good news! - victory is close at hand in the Iraq War. Pinch me.

comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: Dear Matt, I suggest you pay more reverence to dear old Dave. Jim Croce has a song that you might use as a mantra the next time you decide to mess around with le superman Dave U. You don't tug on Superman's cape You don't spit into the wind You don't pull the mask off the old Lone Ranger And you don't mess around with DU, da do da do... Dennis

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Dennis, Matt would happily talk trash about you, you old geezer, but you're never around. :)

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: "Old geezer?!" How long have you worked here Bailey, not counting tomorrow?
